title: IP Not Working
body: I Play a game of LoL only to finish and see i have not recieved any IP from the game i have just participated in ! i found out about the issue today after i played 3 Games of LoL, The end game screen says i have been awarded Said amounts of ip, but to my discovery when i go to the home page i have not been awarded IP. Does anyone know a fix to this ?

replies.body:
Hey there,

If the match is showing in your match history and it says you've been awarded IP, then you've been awarded IP.

Sometimes the client won't update the displayed value automatically, in which case you might need to restart your client for the value to update.
